name: download-artifacts
description: Download Artifacts task, can be used in release definitions, to filter and download, for given build artifact(s), by build artifact name, when multiple artifacts available in build.
author: Chaminda Chandrasekara

inputs.name: artifactNames
inputs.label: Build Artifact Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Artifact Names to Download separated by ;. Example 'Drop1;Drop2' (without quotes). * for all artifacts

inputs.name: artifactDestinationFolder
inputs.label: Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: Absolute path of the destination folder on the local machine, or a UNC Share like c:\fabrikamfiber or \\\\fabrikamshare\fabrikamfiber.
